main event: On 2 February 1957, an unidentified flying object was observed at Randolph AFB in San Antonio, Texas.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 2-3 minutes., The object moved from northwest to southeast., There were 2 officers and 2 airmen who witnessed the event., The observers are considered reliable and highly qualified personnel., The conclusion drawn was that it was probably a meteor.
witness description: two officers and two airmen at Randolph AFB
